tit.cmt: 用語集の訳に訂正しました。

sen.j: 日清協約（にっしんきょうやく）とは、日本と中国を支配していた清王朝との間で締結された条約である。
sen.e: The Nisshin Agreement was the treaty concluded between Japan and the Qing Dynasty which ruled China.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The Sino-Japanese Agreement was the treaty concluded between Japan and the Qing Dynasty which ruled China.
sen.cmt: 日清協約：用語集の訳に訂正しました。
sen.e: The Sino-Japanese Agreement was the treaty concluded between Japan and the Qing Dynasty which ruled China.

sen.j: 通例では1909年9月4日に締結された「満州及び間島に関する日清協約」、別名「間島協約」を指す。
sen.e: Commonly it is referred to "the Nisshin Agreement on Machuria and Kando" or "the Kando Agreement" which was concluded on September 4, 1909.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Commonly it is referred to "the Sino-Japanese Agreement on Machuria and Kando" or "the Kando Agreement" which was concluded on September 4, 1909.
sen.cmt: 日清協約：用語集の訳に訂正しました。
sen.e: Commonly it is referred to 'the Sino-Japanese Agreement on Machuria and Kando' or 'the Kando Agreement' which was concluded on September 4, 1909.

sen.j: この協約は、1910年の日本による韓国併合に先立って、清と大韓帝国との国境を画定させる意味を持った。
sen.e: Before Japan annexed Korea in 1910, this agreement had a significance that it demarcated a border between Qing and the Korean Empire.
Before Japan annexed Korea in 1910, this agreement had a significance demarcating a border between Qing and the Korean Empire.
sen.cmt: that it demarcated ⇒ demarcating に訂正しました。
sen.e: Before Japan annexed Korea in 1910, this agreement had a significance demarcating a border between Qing and the Korean Empire.
